arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the firewall policy.

description.description: A friendly description of the firewall policy.

encryptionConfiguration.description: KMS encryption configuration settings. See Encryption Configuration below for details.

firewallPolicy.description: A configuration block describing the rule groups and policy actions to use in the firewall policy. See Firewall Policy below for details.

name.description: A friendly name of the firewall policy.

tags.description: Map of resource tags to associate with the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

updateToken.description: A string token used when updating a firewall policy.

description.description: A friendly description of the firewall policy.

encryptionConfiguration.description: KMS encryption configuration settings. See Encryption Configuration below for details.

firewallPolicy.description: A configuration block describing the rule groups and policy actions to use in the firewall policy. See Firewall Policy below for details.

name.description: A friendly name of the firewall policy.

tags.description: Map of resource tags to associate with the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering FirewallPolicy resources.
